channel.title: Runserver error
channel.description:
I got a error. Well i really don't think it is a error, but it says. "Press any key to continue..." When i try to run it. Any ideas? i don't think i have to correct path or something. No clue how to do anything. I just started so be nice :)
[code]@echo off title DeltaScape java ItemReplace pause[/code]

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @3d3r 3d3r
item.description:
@3d3r wrote:

OverloadX. and like the server is all in one folder on my desktop. idk if thats packaged or in one directory.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

Yes,

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read the bottom part. Also, what source is it? Are all the files in one directory, or is it packaged?

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @3d3r 3d3r
item.description:
@3d3r wrote:

[quote=“TOMSCAPE BETA, post:7, topic:376336”] @echo off title Run java -cp . -Xmx500m server pause

If it doesn’t work make sure you’ve set your PATHs etc…[/quote]

Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: server Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: server at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: server. Program will exit. Press any key to continue . . .

I got this and is there a tut on how to set paths?

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

@echo off
title Run
java -cp . -Xmx500m server
pause

If it doesn’t work make sure you’ve set your PATHs etc…

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error
item.dc:creator: @3d3r 3d3r
item.description:
@3d3r wrote:

[quote=“buut15, post:5, topic:376336”]Right Click “run.bat” and then click Edit. Then add this.

@echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server[/quote]

when i did that i got a error then the cmd disappears real quick.

Read full topic

item.title: Runserver error

item.description:
@buut15 wrote:

Right Click “run.bat” and then click Edit. Then add this.

@echo off title DeltaScape java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar server
